name: Golden Knight (Senaglusus)
description:
Battle through the grounds of an abandoned castle in this action adventure platformer!

Contest with dangerous enemies and traps, defeat 6 challenging bosses, and explore 9 unique levels!

Use the left and right arrow keys to move side to side, the up arrow to jump, and the space key to attack.  Use the jump key while moving into a vertical wall to climb it.

You can also pause the game using the escape key.
